ygData.subject: RE: Wakishi quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh, I ve agreed from the beginning that this is a bogus quest. From the moment I heard it. But I m still not gonna claim to know it s false, absolutely,
ygData.messageBody:
> > You were playing your dark elf SK when you tested, right?

> talk about the lute to a dark elf SK? i doubt it, and being told by many
> how to really get the wakizishi,having nothing to do with grimlot, i figure
> grimlot is not part of it.

Oh, I've agreed from the beginning that this is a bogus quest. From the
moment I heard it. But I'm still not gonna claim to know it's false,
absolutely, positively, until I've done it the way they say it's supposed
to be done. So, of course, I asked. That's all.

---
